thread.title: Watch: Rockstars Who Threw Out Or Physically Attacked Hecklers During Shows [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: Rockstars Who Threw Out Or Physically Attacked Hecklers During Shows [News]

title: Watch: Rockstars Who Threw Out Or Physically Attacked Hecklers During Shows [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 10 hours ago 3 
An interesting video list has surfaced via Blend Guitar, presenting several cases of rock and metal musicians handling hecklers at shows. 
The rundown features the likes of Dave Mustaine, Corey Taylor, Andy Biersack and Billie Joe Armstrong verbally addressing the hecklers, throwing them out or even physically attacking them.And yes, even when handling hecklers, Paul Gilbert is a super nice guy. 
You can check it all out in the embedded player below.
